page.title: 17A DAY IN OUR LIFE
page.content: I am a boy aged ten years living in Fernden Lane. This is my daily routine: after getting out of bed, I have breakfast of cereal and a cup of tea. I go to school from 9.00am to 3.30pm. I play games after school in the woods near my house. I have a cooked tea, followed by bed at 9.00pm. I'm a girl aged ten years old. I live on Marley Hanger. I like lots of clothes. I like balloon pocket skirts, baggy tops, and anything fashionable. I am a boy aged ten living on Marley Hanger. When I get up in the morning I get dressed. My clothing consist of trousers (made of polyester and cotton), sweater (made of wool), shirt (made of nylon), underwear and socks (made of cotton) and shoes (made of leather).
